casebody.data:
PAUL MARTIN, MICHAEL GIULIANO, FRANK PETRUCCI AND JEAN FRATELLO, PLAINTIFFS-APPELLANTS, v. JULIA MAZZIOTTI, DEFENDANT-RESPONDENT. Superior Court of New Jersey Appellate Division Argued June 30, 1952 Decided July 10, 1952.

Before Judges Eastwood, Stein and Oleaby.

Mr. Victor II. Miles argued the cause for the plaintiffs-appellants. Mr. Charles Blv/me argued, the cause for the defendant-respondent. Pee Ccbtam.

The judgment will he affirmed for the reasons expressed in the opinion of Judge Colie in the Law Division, reported in 17 N. J. Super. 302 (Law Div. 1952).
